data.message: Why was interdict of My p Facebook? Please stop the ban so that I can publish to a Facebook Page faisaly.alz3eem

replies.message: Hi, Bader. It's possible that your account was blocked due to member feedback our team received. Keep in mind that blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days and that we can't lift this block for any reason. -Rhea
FACEBOOK WILL YOU ANSWER ME FOR ONCE FOR GOD SAKE??
Facebook Why do not lift the ban on Page faisaly.alz3eem, did not penetrate Facebook laws, hope you raise because our urban represent Gym does not offend anyone or any entity.
Facebook Why do not lift the ban on Page faisaly.alz3eem, did not penetrate Facebook laws, hope you raise because our urban represent Gym does not offend anyone or any entity.

Hi, Angelica. It's against the Facebook Terms to use a personal account to represent something other than yourself (ex: your business), and your friend could permanently lose access to her account if she doesn't convert it to a Page. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2ejrces. -Rhea

Facebook that is the problem. It is her real name and she has a page, they are both the same name and she has some of her following on both because she posts makeup tutorials on live stream. A troll online reported her as a business account when it is NOT one. She's not using her personal to make any money or business. Can I please have someone look at her appeal because she can't even use her page to update clients.
She sent me her case number on a text and I could give it to you. It is costing our actual page business now that she is disabled.
Facebook admin Rhea please help us out with this, you are the only one who has actually responded.
Hi, Angelica. Please keep in mind that there are many reasons why an account might be disabled, and we handle each of these cases differently. You can learn more here: http://bit.ly/2emh5pd. -Rhea

I understand but we would really appreciate if someone could look at her case. We really love the personal connectivity of facebook and we would hate to loose all they people who enjoyed her tutorials just because trolls are able to report profiles for their entertainment. Case 368042074 thank you.
rhea seems to be a robot too,automated replies does it too

Facebook good morning, facebook! here is my now daily request for clarification on what happens to those of us who are unable to install apps on our smartphones when you discontinue the mobile messaging site. Looking forward to your response.

Facebook good morning, facebook! here is my now daily request for clarification on what happens to those of us who are unable to install apps on our smartphones when you discontinue the mobile messaging site. Looking forward to your response.
Go to your right on the top, click the arrow, go to setting, you can see botton , desactivate or activate your account.
Hi Randy, how can we help you? -Elizabeth
#facebook no one responded to me either here.
They won't respond to you if you're not Muslim blood!!
Hey Yasir, how can we help? -Elizabeth
You can help by quit being prejudice!!!

Hey Yasir. If you come across a Page that violates our Terms, please report it. To submit a report, go to the Page you want to report and click the drop-down below the Page's cover. Then select Report Page and follow the on-screen directions to file a report. -Joe
They only block white people
facebook responds to everyone just not sure why my questions arent being answered.

FACEBOOK..DOESNT REVIEW OUR APPEALS,REPORTS...SENT AN APPEAL FOR 2MONTHS NOTHING HAPPENED...THATS WHAT FB DO TO SMALL BUSINESS PAGES..MINE HAS 320K LIKES ,I AM RE BRANDING OUR PAGE BY RENAMING THE PAGE ITSLEF,RECEIVE A NOTIFICATION THAT THE PAGE HAS RECEIVE RESTRICTIONS?WHERE IS MERCY?? NOW IT CANT BE RENAME AND MERGE TO ANY PAGES..IF FB REALLY CARES IT ISSUES LIKES THIS CAN BE RESOLVED IN JUST 1-2WEEKS LIKE GOOGLE DOES
